verses.verse: Yahweh, <WH3068> don't <WH3198> rebuke me in your anger, <WH639> neither discipline <WH3256> me in your wrath. <WH2534>
Have mercy <WH2603> on me, <WH3068> Yahweh, for I am faint. <WH536> Yahweh, <WH3068> heal <WH7495> me, <WH6106> for my bones are troubled. <WH926>
My soul <WH5315> is also in great <WH3966> anguish. <WH926> But you, <WH3068> Yahweh â€”how long?
Return, <WH7725> Yahweh. <WH3068> Deliver <WH2502> my soul, <WH5315> and save <WH3467> me for your loving kindness <WH2617>' sake.
For in death <WH4194> there is no memory <WH2143> of you. <WH7585> In Sheol, who shall give you thanks? <WH3034>
I am weary <WH3021> with my groaning. <WH585> Every night <WH3915> I flood <WH7811> my bed. <WH4296> I drench <WH4529> my couch <WH6210> with my tears. <WH1832>
My eye <WH5869> wastes <WH6244> away because of grief. <WH3708> It grows old <WH6275> because of all my adversaries. <WH6887>
Depart <WH5493> from me, <WH6466> all you workers of iniquity, <WH205> for Yahweh <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of my weeping. <WH1065>
Yahweh <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> my supplication. <WH8467> Yahweh <WH3068> accepts <WH3947> my prayer. <WH8605>
May all my enemies <WH341> be ashamed <WH954> and dismayed. <WH926> <WH3966> They shall turn back, <WH7725> they shall be disgraced <WH954> suddenly. <WH7281>
